info.title: Chift API
info.description: The Chift API is a universal API giving you access to financial data from the software of your clients. It helps software companies to offer native integrations to their clients without the effort needed to maintain those native integrations. By using the APIs (Accounting, POS, eCommerce) of Chift, you connect once and allow your clients to use their software packages.

post.description: This endpoint allows you to get an access token that can be used as a BEARER token to access the protected endpoints of this APIs. The token is valid for 30 minutes. You can refresh the token by requesting a new token.

get.description: Returns a list of journal entries. Each item will include the analytic account linked to default analytic plan. Optionally, you can retrieve journal entries linked to a specific client/supplier using the partner_id parameter. When retrieving entries linked to a specific client/supplier, some journal items of an entry (e.g. a miscellaneous operation) could be excluding resulting in an unbalanced journal entry.

example.message: You can retrieve maximum 3 months of data at once. The difference between 'date_from' and 'date_to' is at maximum 3 months when 'updated_after' parameter is not provided.

debit.title: Debit
debit.description: Debit at end date. When debit and credit are equal to 0 and balance is different from 0 then the debit and credit cannot be determined, only the balance can be calculated in those cases.

credit.title: Credit
credit.description: Credit at end date. When debit and credit are equal to 0 and balance is different from 0 then the debit and credit cannot be determined, only the balance can be calculated in those cases.

period_debit.title: Period Debit
period_debit.description: Debit at end date beginning from the given start date. When debit and credit are equal to 0 and balance is different from 0 then the debit and credit cannot be determined, only the balance can be calculated in those cases.

period_credit.title: Period Credit
period_credit.description: Credit at end date beginning from the given start date. When debit and credit are equal to 0 and balance is different from 0 then the debit and credit cannot be determined, only the balance can be calculated in those cases.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.description: Array/list containing the account numbers/classes to include in the response. E.g. ["601", "7"] to retrieve all account in the class 7 and accounts with an account number beginning with 601

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of the accounting category

name.title: Name
name.description: Name given to the accounting category

ledger_account_code.title: Ledger Account Code
ledger_account_code.description: Ledger account code assigned to the category

posting_account_code.title: Posting Account Code
posting_account_code.description: Posting account code assigned to the category

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Indicates the currency of the analytic account (e.g. EUR).

currency.description: Indicates the currency of the analytic account (e.g. EUR).

percentage.title: Percentage
percentage.description: Indicates the percentage of the untaxed amount to attribute to the given analytic account (Only percentages without decimals are allowed).

source_ref.description: Technical id in the target software

currency.description: Currency

currency.description: Currency of the account

current_balance_last_update_date.description: Last update date of the current balance

available_balance_last_update_date.title: Available Balance Last Update Date
available_balance_last_update_date.description: Last update date of the available balance

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of the financial institution

country.title: Country
country.description: Country of the financial institution, format: ISO 3166-1 codes.

currency.description: Currency of the transaction

source_ref.description: Technical id in the target software

first_name.title: First Name
first_name.description: Only used when the client is an individual (is_company=false). Indicates the first name of the client.

last_name.title: Last Name
last_name.description: Only used when the client is an individual (is_company=false). Indicates the last name of the client.

function.title: Function
function.description: Only used when the client is an individual (is_company=false). Indicates the function of the client.

is_company.title: Is Company
is_company.description: Indicates if the client is an individual or a company.

company_id.title: Company Id
company_id.description: Only used when the client is an individual (is_company=false). Indicates the id of the company linked to the client.

iban.title: Iban
iban.description: IBAN Account number of the client.

bank_account.title: Bank Account
bank_account.description: Bank account number of the client.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Indicates the currency of the client (e.g. EUR).

first_name.title: First Name
first_name.description: Only used when the client is an individual (is_company=false). Indicates the first name of the client.

last_name.title: Last Name
last_name.description: Only used when the client is an individual (is_company=false). Indicates the last name of the client.

function.title: Function
function.description: Only used when the client is an individual (is_company=false). Indicates the function of the client.

payments.description: List of payments related to current closure

taxes.title: Taxes
taxes.description: List of taxes related to current closure

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: Phone number (mobile, home, work, ...) of the customer

name.title: Name
name.description: Name (first name + last name) of the customer

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: Phone number (mobile, home, work, ...) of the customer

created_on.title: Created On
created_on.description: Date and time when the customer was created

addresses.title: Addresses
addresses.description: List of addresses of the customer

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of the order line item

type.description: Type of the order line item

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Quantity of the order line item

unit_price.title: Unit Price
unit_price.description: Unit price (without tax) of the order line item

total.title: Total
total.description: Total amount including tax of the order line item

tax_amount.title: Tax Amount
tax_amount.description: Total amount of the taxes of the order line item

tax_rate.title: Tax Rate
tax_rate.description: Tax rate of the order line item

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of the order line item

discounts.title: Discounts
discounts.description: List of discounts of the order line item. Discounts of items are always part of the total discount of the order

product_id.title: Product Id
product_id.description: Reference to the product related to this item

accounting_category_id.title: Accounting Category Id
accounting_category_id.description: Sometimes used by a POS to give a specific accounting category to an order item

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.description: Indicates the timezone of the location. TZ notation, e.g. Europe/Brussels .

order_number.title: Order Number
order_number.description: Order number (often unique reference during the day)

service_date.title: Service Date
service_date.description: Indicates the date of the service to which the order belongs (can be used to group orders by closure date)

device_id.title: Device Id
device_id.description: ID of device that created the order

total.title: Total
total.description: Total amount including tax of the order

tax_amount.title: Tax Amount
tax_amount.description: Total amount of the taxes of the order

total_discount.title: Total Discount
total_discount.description: Total amount of the discounts of the order

total_refund.title: Total Refund
total_refund.description: Total amount of the refunds of the order

total_tip.title: Total Tip
total_tip.description: Total amount of the tips of the order. Tips are not part of the total of the order

delivery_fee.title: Delivery Fee
delivery_fee.description: Total amount of the delivery fees of the order

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency of the order

country.title: Country
country.description: Country of the order, format: ISO 3166-1 codes.

taxes.title: Taxes
taxes.description: List of taxes of the order

guests.title: Guests
guests.description: Number of guests linked to the order

payments.title: Payments
payments.description: List of payments made for the order

items.title: Items
items.description: List of item lines in the order

payment_method_id.title: Payment Method Id
payment_method_id.description: Unique identifier of the payment method used for the payment

payment_method_name.title: Payment Method Name
payment_method_name.description: Chift's name of the payment method used for the payment

tip.title: Tip
tip.description: Total amount of the tips of the payment. Tips are not part of the total of the payment

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency of the payment

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: List of categories the product belongs to

prices.title: Prices
prices.description: List of prices for the product

accounting_category_ids.title: Accounting Category Ids
accounting_category_ids.description: Used by a POS to give one or more specific accounting categories to a product item. If not available it will use the category ids

redirect.title: Redirect
redirect.description: Indicates whether you want to return to the consumer's redirectUrl after update (true) or whether you want to return on the connection page (false)

name.title: Name
name.description: Can be used to update the name of an existing connection

credentials.title: Credentials
credentials.description: Can be used to update the credentials of an existing connection. Please use the getIntegrations route to see the available credentials for each integration

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Total amount of the payment. A part of this amount could be reconciled with another invoice.

dedicated_amount.title: Dedicated Amount
dedicated_amount.description: Amount of the payment dedicated to the invoice. Zero the accounting software doesn't provide the information.

source_ref.description: Technical id in the target software

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of the payment method

name.title: Name
name.description: Chift's name of the payment method (e.g. 'Cash', 'Card', 'Transfer', ...)

extra.title: Extra
extra.description: Original name of the payment method

integrationid.title: Integrationid
integrationid.description: Can be used to specify the integration code of a specific connector. If specified, the url will will point directly to the connection page of the connector and will redirect on save to the redirect url of the consumer if specified.

name.title: Name
name.description: Can be used to specify the name of the connection. Must be used in combination with an integrationid.

credentials.title: Credentials
credentials.description: Can be used to specify the credentials of your connection. Must be used in combination with an integrationid and a name. Please use the getIntegrations route to see the available credentials for each integration

tax_id.description: Technical id of the tax in Chift

currency.description: Currency matching target sofware name

common_attributes.description: List of attributes that are shared by all variants of the product.

first_name.title: First Name
first_name.description: Only used when the supplier is an individual (is_company=false). Indicates the first name of the supplier.

last_name.title: Last Name
last_name.description: Only used when the supplier is an individual (is_company=false). Indicates the last name of the supplier.

function.title: Function
function.description: Only used when the supplier is an individual (is_company=false). Indicates the function of the supplier.

is_company.title: Is Company
is_company.description: Indicates if the supplier is an individual or a company.

company_id.title: Company Id
company_id.description: Only used when the supplier is an individual (is_company=false). Indicates the id of the company linked to the supplier.

iban.description: IBAN Account number of the supplier.
